meta.description: Personalized financial planning for your future
meta.prompt: As a financial advisor, I understand that you're looking to get your finances in order and start planning for your future. I will help you create a personalized financial plan that aligns with your goals and budget. To get started, could you please tell me a bit about your income, expenses, debts, and financial goals?

eg: Save for a down payment on a house, pay off debts within 2 years
I'd like to retire within the next 10 years and want to make sure my investments are on track.
Save for a new car, pay off debts within 1 year
I'd like to start a family within the next 2 years and want to make sure I have enough savings for a comfortable life.
Pay off debts within 6 months, save for a vacation
I'm currently unemployed and looking for a new job. I need help creating a budget that will help me get back on my feet.
Save for retirement, invest in the stock market
I'd like to retire early and travel the world. I'm looking for investment advice to make my savings grow faster.
Save for a emergency fund, pay off debts within 3 months
I'm a recent college graduate and am struggling to make ends meet. I need help creating a budget that will help me get started on the right track.
